issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: Set the simple fetch task conversion to "more" with a default threshold of 1Gb

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Currently, modifying the value of hive.fetch.task.conversion to "more" results in a dangerous setting where small scale queries function, but large scale queries crash.

This occurs because the default threshold of -1 means apply this optimization for a petabyte table.

I am testing a variety of queries with the setting "more" (to make it the default option as suggested by HIVE-887) change the default threshold for this feature to a reasonable 1Gb.
fields.summary: Set the default threshold for fetch task conversion to 1Gb

comments.body: [~navis]: Could you review this change?
[~gopalv] I've been thinking of changing default value of hive.fetch.task.conversion to 'more'. Can we get this altogether within this issue?

Yes, we can try to get it in as default.

My only concern with that was that nearly all unit tests have < 1Gb of data.
Yes, we should disable it for the test, in data/conf/hive-site.xml.
Handle the partition filter only + limit case.

[~navis]: changed the defaults and disabled it for tests.

Also modified the codepath to handle the simple project + limit + partition filter case, even for a big table.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12655368/HIVE-7397.2.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12657243
The test failures are unrelated.

This changes the default for *hive.fetch.task.conversion* from "minimal" to "more" and changes the default for *hive.fetch.task.conversion.threshold* from "-1l" to "1073741824L" in HiveConf.java and the template file so the wiki needs to be updated with version notes and links back to this JIRA ticket.  (In hive-site.xml, *hive.fetch.task.conversion* is set to "minimal".)

* [Configuration Properties -- hive.fetch.task.conversion | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.fetch.task.conversion ]
* [Configuration Properties -- hive.fetch.task.conversion.threshold | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.fetch.task.conversion.threshold ]
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.

Doc:  The defaults for *hive.fetch.task.conversion* and *hive.fetch.task.conversion.threshold* have been updated in the wiki, so I'm removing the TODOC14 label.
